item.title: 马斯克的 "星链 "获得乍得批准，以改善互联网接入
item.description: 乍得周二表示，已批准向埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的卫星互联网服务提供商 Starlink 发放许可证，以改善这个非洲中部国家的互联网服务。【原文：Chad said on Tuesday it had approved the licensing of Elon Musk's satellite internet provider Starlink to improve access to internet services in the central African country.】

item.title: 亏损的电动汽车公司 VinFast 将从创始人和母公司处获得 34 亿美元的额外融资
item.description: 在纳斯达克上市的电动汽车制造商 VinFast 周三表示，到 2026 年，该公司将从其创始人及其母公司 Vingroup 获得价值 85 万亿盾（33.5 亿美元）的新一轮融资，预计届时将实现收支平衡。【原文：Nasdaq-listed electric vehicle maker VinFast said on Wednesday it will get a fresh round of funding worth 85 trillion dong ($3.35 billion) from its founder and its parent firm, Vingroup by 2026, when it expects to break even.】

item.title: 拜登任期即将结束，美国对石油和天然气排放者征收甲烷费
item.description: 美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）领导的政府周二敲定了向大型石油和天然气生产商征收甲烷费的方案，该方案旨在减少这种强温室气体的排放，但很可能会被即将上任的唐纳德-特朗普总统废除。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden's administration on Tuesday finalized a methane fee for big oil and gas producers meant to slash emissions of the powerful greenhouse gas, but which is likely to be scrapped by the incoming presidency of Donald Trump.】

item.title: 壳牌气候案裁决要点
item.description: 荷兰上诉法院周二驳回了一项具有里程碑意义的 2021 年裁决，该裁决命令石油和天然气巨头壳牌公司加快碳减排工作，这被视为气候诉讼的转折点。【原文：A Dutch appeals court on Tuesday dismissed a landmark 2021 ruling, ordering oil and gas giant Shell to accelerate carbon reduction efforts that was seen as a turning point in climate litigation.】

item.title: 珠海航展开幕，中国商飞获得订单，未来航天飞机初露端倪
item.description: 中国的航空航天雄心在第一天就占据了中心位置。【原文：China's aerospace ambitions took centre stage on the first day.】

item.title: 巴西 BTG Pactual 公布季度调整后净收入增长 15
item.description: 巴西 BTG Pactual 银行第三季度调整后净收入比去年同期猛增 15%，主要得益于收入增加和运营杠杆的改善。【原文：Brazil's Banco BTG Pactual's third-quarter adjusted net income jumped 15% from the same period last year supported by higher revenues and improved operational leverage.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长霍尔茨曼：特朗普政策将给通胀带来上行压力
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）决策者罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）周二表示，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）上任后将实施的政策可能会给大西洋两岸的通胀带来上升压力。【原文：The policies that U.S. President-elect Donald Trump will implement once in office will likely put upward pressure on inflation on both sides of the Atlantic, European Central Bank policymaker Robert Holzmann said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国中航工业在珠海航展上展示无人驾驶货运飞船
item.description: 周二，在珠海举行的中国最大航展上，国有航空航天公司中航工业推出了中国首架商用无人驾驶航天飞机，其任务是为中国空间站提供补给。【原文：State-owned aerospace company AVIC unveiled China's first commercial uncrewed spaceplane at the country's biggest air show in Zhuhai on Tuesday, with a mission of supplying the Chinese space station.】

item.title: 阿维亚订购 40 架波音 737 MAX 喷气式飞机
item.description: 阿维亚解决方案集团（Avia Solutions Group）周二在一份联合声明中表示，该公司租赁飞机并提供相关服务，已订购 40 架波音 737 Max 8 喷气式飞机，并可选择再订购 40 架。【原文：Avia Solutions Group, which leases aircraft and provides related services, has ordered 40 Boeing 737 Max 8 jets, with an option to order 40 additional jets, the companies said in a joint statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: Kantar 表示，英国杂货通胀再次走高
item.description: 周二的行业数据显示，在食品杂货价格通胀率再次走高之后，英国购物者上个月面临着更大的预算压力。【原文：British shoppers faced increased pressure on their budgets last month after grocery price inflation edged higher again, industry data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 壳牌赢得对荷兰具有里程碑意义的气候裁决的上诉
item.description: 石油和天然气公司壳牌周二赢得了对荷兰一项具有里程碑意义的气候裁决的上诉。【原文：Oil and gas company Shell on Tuesday won its appeal against a landmark climate ruling in the Netherlands, which in 2021 ordered the oil and gas company to sharply reduce greenhouse gas emissions.】

item.title: 德国电视客户流失打击沃达丰
item.description: 移动运营商沃达丰（Vodafone）周二报告称，受电视销售法律修改的影响，第二季度其最大市场德国的业绩急剧下滑，股价下跌 4%。【原文：Mobile operator Vodafone on Tuesday reported a sharp downturn in Germany, it biggest market, in the second quarter after it was hit by a change in the law on TV sales, sending its shares 4% lower.】

item.title: 英国正常工资增长降温，与英国央行对经济的看法一致
item.description: 周二的官方数据显示，英国第三季度扣除奖金的工资增长降至两年多来的最低水平，这将使英国央行相信，通胀压力将如其所愿继续缓解。【原文：British wage growth excluding bonuses fell in the third quarter to its lowest level in over two years, official data showed on Tuesday, something that will give the Bank of England confidence that inflation pressures will continue to ease as it hopes.】

item.title: 阿斯利康第三季度业绩大增，上调 2024 年收入和利润预期
item.description: 受癌症和罕见病药物强劲需求的帮助，制药商阿斯利康周二第二次上调了年度销售额和利润预期，此前第三季度业绩超出预期。【原文：Drugmaker AstraZeneca lifted its annual sales and profit forecast for the second time this year on Tuesday, helped by strong demand for its cancer and rare diseases medicines, after third-quarter results beat estimates.】

item.title: 农业市场疲软，拜耳下调财年运营收益预期
item.description: 拜耳周二下调了全年运营收益指导，理由是拉丁美洲农业市场疲软。【原文：Bayer on Tuesday lowered its full-year operating earnings guidance, citing weaker agricultural markets in Latin America.】

item.title: 软银获利 77 亿美元，重新实现季度盈利
item.description: 日本软银集团（SoftBank Group）在截至 9 月份的三个月内实现净利润 1.18 万亿日元（约合 77 亿美元），原因是这家科技巨头受益于其愿景基金（Vision Fund）投资工具中上市公司股价的上涨。【原文：Japan's SoftBank Group swung to a 1.18 trillion yen ($7.7 billion) net profit in the three months to September, as the tech giant benefitted from higher share prices of listed companies in its Vision Fund investment vehicles.】

item.title: 激进分子 Effissimo 入股后，日产汽车股价大涨逾 20
item.description: 一份文件显示，一家与激进投资者 Effissimo Capital Management 有关的实体已持有这家陷入困境的日本汽车制造商的股份，此后日产汽车股价周二跳涨达 20.6%。【原文：Nissan Motor shares jumped as much as 20.6% on Tuesday after a filing showed an entity related to activist investor Effissimo Capital Management had taken a stake in the struggling Japanese automaker.】

item.title: 越南扩大芯片封装业务，投资者减少与中国的联系
item.description: 高管们表示，由于与西方国家的贸易关系紧张，越南的工业活动正加速从中国向外转移，因此外国公司正在越南扩大测试和封装芯片的产能，而国内公司也在关注投资。【原文：Foreign companies are expanding capacity in Vietnam for testing and packaging chips while domestic firms are eyeing investments, as a shifting of industrial activity away from China gathers pace due to trade tensions with the West, executives said.】

item.title: 交易蓬勃发展，凯雷、沃伯格等投资公司在日本猎取人才
item.description: 凯雷、华平和许多全球投资公司都计划随着日本交易的激增而增加在日本的员工人数，但在过去二十年的大部分时间里，日本的收购交易数量相对较少，因此很难找到具有专业知识的人才。【原文：Carlyle, Warburg Pincus and a host of global investment firms plan to beef up headcount in Japan as deals here surge, but the country's relatively low number of buyouts for much of the past two decades has made it tough to find people with expertise.】

item.title: 早间竞价比特币在特朗普交易的推动下闪闪发光
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 空中客车公司在关税日益加剧的不安中捍卫自由贸易
item.description: 欧洲飞机制造商空中客车公司周二为自由贸易辩护，因为航空航天业面临的经济紧张局势日益加剧。【原文：European planemaker Airbus defended free trade on Tuesday as the aerospace industry faces a growing cluster of economic tensions.】

item.title: 中国商飞称国航是 C929 宽体飞机的首家客户
item.description: 中国商飞公司周二表示，国航是中国飞机制造商正在研发的 C929 宽体飞机的首家客户，该飞机旨在与空客和波音的双通道机型竞争。【原文：COMAC said on Tuesday that Air China was the first customer for the Chinese planemaker's C929 widebody aircraft under development that is designed to compete with twin-aisle models from Airbus and Boeing .】

item.title: 日本的政治支柱玉木旨在释放耶伦激发的经济繁荣
item.description: 玉木雄一郎（Yuichiro Tamaki）是一个小反对党的领导人，现在他已经能够发挥巨大的政治影响力，他长期以来一直在思考如何以最佳方式重振陷入通货紧缩、奄奄一息的日本经济。【原文：Yuichiro Tamaki, the leader of a small opposition party now able to wield outsized political influence, had long puzzled over how best to revive a moribund deflation-entrapped Japanese economy.】

item.title: 百度通过文本到图像生成器和无代码应用程序生成器加强人工智能阵容
item.description: 中国百度公司周二发布了其人工智能技术的一系列新应用，包括一个文本到图像生成器和一个使用户无需编码专业知识即可开发应用软件的工具。【原文：China's Baidu Inc unveiled a slew of new applications for its artificial intelligence technology on Tuesday, including a text-to-image generator and a tool that enables users to develop software applications without coding expertise.】

item.title: 飞机被子弹击中后，捷蓝航空将在 12 月 2 日之前停止飞往海地的航班
item.description: 捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways）周一晚些时候表示，在一架从太子港返回的飞机上发现子弹造成的损坏后，该公司将把往返海地的所有航班的停飞时间延长至 12 月 2 日。【原文：JetBlue Airways said late on Monday it will extend a halt to all flights to and from Haiti through Dec. 2 after damage from a bullet to a plane returning from Port-au-Prince was discovered.】

item.title: 亚洲股市回落，比特币因特朗普的兴奋而飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市有所回落，美元则维持在四个月高位，但所有的兴奋点都集中在比特币上，因为投资者押注于可能从唐纳德-特朗普赢得大选中获益的资产，比特币因此飙升至创纪录的峰值。【原文：Asian stocks eased while the dollar held at four-month highs on Tuesday, though all the excitement was centred on bitcoin as it soared to a record peak underpinned by investor bets on assets that are likely to benefit from Donald Trump's election win.】

item.title: 受特朗普提振，比特币涨势破纪录，逼近 90,000 美元
item.description: 自唐纳德-特朗普当选美国总统以来，人们期待他的政府将对加密货币友好，比特币在周二站上了 90,000 美元的边缘。【原文：Bitcoin stood on the verge of $90,000 on Tuesday, riding a wave of euphoria since the election of Donald Trump as U.S. president on expectations his administration will be crypto friendly.】

item.title: 中国商飞将支线飞机更名为 C909，以推动市场营销
item.description: 中国商飞公司已将其 ARJ21 支线喷气机重新命名为 C909，使该飞机与这家国有企业的其他机型命名惯例保持一致，以取代占主导地位的西方飞机制造商。【原文：Chinese planemaker COMAC has rebranded its ARJ21 regional jet as the C909, aligning the plane with the state-owned firm's naming convention for its other models as it seeks to present itself as an alternative to dominant Western planemakers.】

item.title: 中国 "光棍节 "落下帷幕，电商企业报告购物人数增长
item.description: 中国最大的电子商务公司阿里巴巴集团（Alibaba Group）表示，今年的 "光棍节 "销售额 "增长强劲"，购物人数 "创历史新高"。【原文：China's largest e-commerce company Alibaba Group said it recorded "robust growth" in sales and a "record number" of shoppers over this year's Singles' Day sales period, a weeks-long event that ended at midnight on Monday.】

item.title: 油价在受中国刺激政策影响而下跌后稳住阵脚
item.description: 周二早盘，油价变化不大，等待欧佩克月度报告为油价提供进一步方向，此前几个交易日，中国的刺激计划和供应过剩担忧令市场风声鹤唳。【原文：Oil prices were little changed in early trading on Tuesday, awaiting further price direction from OPEC's monthly report after China's stimulus plan and oversupply concerns took the wind out of markets in prior sessions.】
